Protech IMPAC MT Plate. Safariland announces a change to our line of PROTECH® IMPAC-MT special threat plates. The IMPAC line of special threat plates continues to evolve as we research methods and materials to offer the best products available to law enforcement officers.

(May 2012). A trauma plate, also known as a trauma pack, is a plate that is an add-on component/insert to a ballistic vest. Its primary purpose is to absorb and disrupt the kinetic energy of a bullet impact and reduce the blunt trauma transferred to the wearer of the vest.

0. Galls is here to keep you safe in high-risk situations that expose you to the threat of blunt trauma or bullet impact. Trauma plates come in several options, including steel construction for a hard shock plate, steel-polymer combination or titanium with a rubberized coating.
